attributes.action: Ban smoking at the G20 conference, or allow the same rules to apply to the " electorate "
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to allow the voters of Britain to smoke in designated rooms as the foreign dignitaries are being allowed to at the G20 conference

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
